original_title: Dzień, w którym znalazłem w śmieciach dziewczynę
overview: In the near future an indifferent activist announces that at midnight on New Year’s Eve he is going to commit suicide in protest against the renewed slavery system in Poland. His plan is put on hold the moment he finds an abandoned slave woman in the trash and decides to help set her free.
title: The Day I Found a Girl in the Trash
